tasks.name: Update apt caches after repo is added (Debian).

options.name: Update apt caches after repo is added (Debian).

tasks.name: Purge PHP version packages (besides the currently chosen php_version).

options.name: Purge PHP version packages (besides the currently chosen php_version).

tasks.name: Also purge php-common package if any versions were just purged.

options.name: Also purge php-common package if any versions were just purged.

tasks.name: Remove missing JSON extension for PHP 8.0 (included by default)

options.name: Remove missing JSON extension for PHP 8.0 (included by default)

tasks.name: Ensure dnf-plugins are installed on CentOS 8+.

options.name: Ensure dnf-plugins are installed on CentOS 8+.

tasks.name: Enable DNF module for CentOS 8+.
tasks.module_options:
dnf config-manager --set-enabled powertools
dnf module enable -y php:remi-{{ php_version }}
